Sensor Data Formatting Standard (S-DFS)¶

S-DFS¶

Parameter Name

Parameter Classification

SDFS Label

Units

Notes

\(PM_{1}\) (particulate matter < 1 micrometer in aerosol diameter)

Pollutant; PM

PM1

\(\mu g/m^3\)

\(PM_{2.5}\) (particulate matter < 2.5 micrometers in aerosol diameter)

Pollutant; Criteria; PM

PM25

\(\mu g/m^3\)

\(PM_{10}\) (particulate matter < 10 micrometers in aerosol diameter)

Pollutant; Criteria; PM

PM10

\(\mu g/m^3\)

\(O_{3}\) (Ozone)

Pollutant; Criteria; Gas

O3

Parts per billion by volume

\(NO\) (Nitric Oxide)

Pollutant; Gas

NO

Parts per billion by volume

\(NO_{2}\) (Nitrogen Dioxide)

Pollutant; Criteria; Gas

NO2

Parts per billion by volume

\(NO_{x}\) (Nitrogen Oxides)

Pollutant; Gas

NOx

Parts per billion by volume

\(SO_{2}\) (Sulfur Dioxide)

Pollutant; Criteria; Gas

SO2

Parts per billion by volume

\(SO_{x}\) (Sulfur Dioxides)

Pollutant; Gas

SOx

Parts per billion by volume

\(CO\) (Carbon Monoxide)

Pollutant; Criteria; Gas

CO

Parts per billion by volume

\(CO_{2}\) (Carbon Dioxide)

Pollutant; Gas

CO2

Parts per billion by volume

Relative Humidity

Meteorological

RH

Percent

Temperature

Meteorological

Temp

Degrees Celsius

Dewpoint

Meteorological

DP

Degrees Celsius

If internal Temp and RH measured, but not DP, DP is calculated via the Dewpoint() module and is labeled ‘DP_calculated’

Wind Speed

Meteorological

WS

Meters/second

Wind Direction

Meteorological

WD

Radians

Pressure

Meteorological

Press

Parameter Units

Parameter Metadata

[param name]_Unit

Parameter QC Code

Parameter Metadata

[param name]_QC

N/a

Latitude of sensor

Siting Metadata

Sensor_Lat

Decimal degrees

Longitude of sensor

Siting Metadata

Sensor_Lon

Decimal degrees

Parameter data normalized by corresponding reference

Performance evaluation

[param name]_Normalized

N/a

Calculated during sensor evaluation analysis
